data.apiNameCn: 查询指定城市时间及时差
data.introduce: 查询城市时间及时差功能对应黑屏的TIME指令，可以查询指定城市的时间以其为基础的一个城市列表的时差情况，黑屏中的使用方式是TIME:城市/日期/时间/城市/城市/...
data.business: 查询指定城市的时间以及指定城市间的时差信息
data.functions:
1、使用UTC时间（GMT）查询指定城市的时间
2、查询多个城市间的时差，以及和GMT标准时的时差
data.requestSchema: [{"name":"TES_QueryCityTimeRQ","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"查询城市时间及时差请求","children":[{"name":"POS","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Point Of Sale","children":[{"name":"Source","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"请求者信息","children":[{"name":"@PseudoCityCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"伪城市代码（Office代码：PKE099）","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"Query","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"Location","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"城市的三字码","children":[]},{"name":"DateTime","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"日期（查询哪天对应的GMT）","children":[]},{"name":"Origin","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"源三字码","children":[]},{"name":"Destinations","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"Destination","type":"string","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"查询的目标三字码数组","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"QueryType","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"查询方式","children":[{"name":"@Type","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"查询方式","children":[]}]},{"name":"Version","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"版本号","children":[]}]}]
data.responseSchema:
[{"name":"TES_QueryCityTimeRS","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"查询城市时间及时差返回","children":[{"name":"Warnings","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"警告信息集合","children":[{"name":"Warning","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"警告信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"警告代码(数字)","children":[]},{"name":"@Type","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"警告类型","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortText","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"警告描述信息(英文)","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"Errors","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误信息集合","children":[{"name":"Error","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误代码（数字）","children":[]},{"name":"@Type","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误类型","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortText","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误描述信息（英文）","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"Result","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"Location","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"城市的三字码","children":[]},{"name":"DateTime","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"查询时间","children":[]},{"name":"Gmt","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"查询出的GMT时间","children":[]},{"name":"TimeDiffInfos","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"TimeDiffInfo","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"航段信息","children":[{"name":"Date","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"日期，yyyy-MM-dd","children":[]},{"name":"Location","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"三字码","children":[]},{"name":"TimeDifference","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"时差，destination三字码相对
                            origin三字码的时差，用
                            destination的标准时差减去origin
                            的标准时差。origin三字码的时差
                            固定为0.0
                            String time12Hr 12小时制时间","children":[]},{"name":"Time12Hr","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"12小时制时间，hh:mma。说明：
                            三字码为origin字段的时间是请求
                            参数输入的dateTime的时间，如果
                            dateTime为空则取当前时间。如果
                            是destination中的三字码，时间根
                            据与origin的时差计算的时间，如
                            果date日期是前一天怎结果会用（- 1）标识，后一天（+1）。","children":[]},{"name":"Time24Hr","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"24小时制时间，HH:mm。说明：
                            三字码为origin字段的时间是请求
                            参数输入的dateTime的时间，如果
                            dateTime为空则取当前时间。如果
                            是destination中的三字码，时间根
                            据与origin的时差计算的时间，如
                            果date日期是前一天怎结果会用（- 1）标识，后一天（+1）。","children":[]},{"name":"Gmt","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"格林威治时间","children":[]},{"name":"GmtTimeDiff","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"标准时差，根据md_ctry_dst表计
                            算得出，考虑夏令时。dateTime在
                            夏令时启用范围内","children":[]}]}]}]}]}]
